personal.name: Cole Ward
personal.title: Network Engineering Intern
personal.summary: Network engineering intern who pairs hands-on infrastructure support with a UW-Platteville computer science and data analytics education to keep hybrid fiber-wireless environments running smoothly.

achievements: Assist senior engineers with monitoring core network health, triaging alerts, and coordinating field responses across Northeast Wisconsin.
Document recurring issues and propose scripts that streamline device configuration updates during maintenance windows.
Coordinated outbound logistics for office furniture lines, verifying orders against CAD drawings and bills of materials.
Improved dock turnaround by reorganizing staging workflows for high-volume summer shipments.
Assembled custom product lines from engineering documentation while upholding daily quality and safety targets.
Collaborated with process engineers to flag manufacturability issues and recommend ergonomic tooling tweaks.
Supported pharmacists by organizing prescriptions, managing point-of-sale transactions, and communicating wait times to customers.
Maintained accuracy across controlled substance logs and nightly inventory counts.
Fulfilled high-volume online grocery orders with 98% accuracy while meeting tight pickup windows.
Trained new associates on handheld order systems and best practices for customer satisfaction.

details: Men's Rugby, Cybersecurity Club, Innovation LLC
